setting.name: saveInterval
setting.description: Seconds that need to pass between two save operations. (will always save on script exit)

setting.name: worldPropLife
setting.description: Minutes a dropped product/box has before getting removed.

setting.name: factoryProductInterval
setting.description: Seconds that need to pass before an empty factory makes 1 product.

setting.name: factoryMaxAutoStock
setting.description: Amount of stock a factory needs to stop auto-generating product.

setting.name: buyerSaleInterval
setting.description: Seconds that need to pass before a full buyer sells 1 product.

setting.name: buyerMinStockPercentage
setting.description: Percentage of stock a buyer needs to stop auto-selling product.
